turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with placing an order for at Starbucks for pickup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a caramel macchiato?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have a preference on milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could I please have five splendors?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And this beverage is hot, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add whip cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you. No whip cream, but I do want the caramel drizzle on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! will make sure that's added.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so i got, a Venti Caramel Macchiato with 2% milk, 5 splendas, make sure . caramel drizzel is added.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay great! may I ask which location you'd like to pick this up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I wanted to put the order in. And it's a Philadelphia, Pennsylvania location, 18th and Market.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've found the starbucks on 1500 Market St Suite 465, Philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! give me one moment to submit the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright your order has been sent. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much for your help.
